Title: The Unforgiven
Plot: Hank Moody narrowly survives the aftermath of his scorned ex-lover Carrie; her attempted suicide to see them both together, free from the constraints around them. Charlie takes Hank to see Atticus Fetch, a rocker who is interested in turning "A Crazy Little Thing Called Love" into a Broadway show. Meanwhile, Karen, Marcy and Charlie have to deal with Hank, after a revelation about Becca.
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Drug use,sex scenes and offensive language
GuestStars: Alexandra Barreto, Chris Gann, Kristina Kruz, Elizabeth Nicole, Carter Sand, Lyndon Smith
